title: [K-12] Expert Course on Surfboard Design and Production for Technology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mechanical engineering knowledge, understanding of materials science, and foundational CAD (Computer-Aided Design) software proficiency
context.additional_context: Mobile device-centric learning environments emphasizing acquisition of practical, field-applicable skills

learning_goals: Learners can apply engineering principles required for surfboard design to create personalized design blueprints.
Learners can simulate the entire surfboard manufacturing process—from material selection to production—under supervisor guidance.
Learners can achieve over 85% accuracy in technical problem-solving processes using video-based learning content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
